import sys

N = int(sys.stdin.readline())

ans = ""

while True:
    if N == 0:
        ans += "0"
        break
    elif N == 1:
        ans += "1"
        break
    elif N == -1:
        ans += "1"
        break

    if N%2 == 0:
        ans += "0"
        N = N//2
    else:
        ans += "1"
        N = N//2
        N += 1

print(ans[::-1])

from sys import stdin

N = int(stdin.readline().rstrip())

binary = ''
while N != 0:
    quotient = N // -2
    remainder = N % -2
    if remainder < 0:
        remainder += 2
        quotient += 1
    binary += str(remainder)
    N = quotient

print(binary[::-1] if binary else '0')
